title: Riot's Music Creators/Producers

embed.description: Listen to LeagueofLegends | Explore the largest community of artists, bands, podcasters and creators of music & audio.. Santa Monica. 140 Tracks. 78683 Followers. Stream Tracks and Playlists from LeagueofLegends on your desktop or mobile device.

body:
The champion theme music is the best thing I have ever heard. I usually have the login screen muted  but after hearing that Kindred theme on Riot's SoundCloud.... ITS SO DAMN GOOD! I don't know who really orchestrates it, or who makes the score for it... but you all have some serious talent! I am so pump for the Virtuoso theme after watching the teaser! <3 keep up the great work and produce more amazing sounds :D 

(time to turn on the login music!)

replies.body:
Hey Deaths Lotus and Tesla Effect,

I wrote both Kindred's music and "The Mind of the Virtuoso" (as well as the corresponding Jhin login screen music).

Thanks for listening!

The five of us in the music department would rather sign our work with "Riot Games" instead of our names. We're a highly collaborative team, and while we're responsible for writing the notes on an individual level, the feedback that we get from each other is invaluable and helps shape the sound of League's music at large. 

Cheers,

Ed the Conqueror

<3 <3 <3 keep up the great work! And I totally understand the reasoning for signing your name with Riot Games, I just wanted to recognize everyone who is in the music department, you all did an amazing job with Kindred and now I'm super excited for Jhin. I just hope you all are getting the type of recognition you deserve! You all are truly fantastic artist. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
more music that is like get jinxed pls, if i had a whole game playlist of fast-paced songs like that in league char voices i would have it on loop when playing league.
Do you have any advice for a beginner composer? I could send you a link to some of my work if you would be willing to critique it.
Yeah, it would be great if they placed description on their soundcloud music, so that we know who actually made the track.
That Diana song just blew me away. Riot Games has an incredible music team!
